entry.tran: （尤指说话内容令人不悦、具冒犯性或愚蠢可笑的）高谈阔论者，夸夸其谈者，胡吹乱侃者
entry.def: If you describe someone as a loudmouth, you are critical of them because they talk a lot, especially in an unpleasant, offensive, or stupid way.

means.word_mean: 1. a person who causes trouble by speaking indiscreetly
